data.proxyObjectName: blue-and-white rectangular tissue box with tissues protruding
data.utilizationMethod: Flip the tissue box so the soft underside faces up; crush downward until the cardboard bows and the tissues compress to the desk.
Stand the box upright with its lid facing up and direct chopping blows onto the center of the lid.

data.proxyObjectName: folded check-pattern umbrella with clear curved handle
data.utilizationMethod: Slip index and middle fingers inside the clear curved handle while pressing thumb along the outside curve, then lift and tilt the folded canopy
Wrap one hand around the lower third of the dowel and perform an over-the-shoulder chopping swing

data.proxyObjectName: long telescoping selfie stick with black handle
data.utilizationMethod: Hold the padded hand grip firmly, keep the pole retracted, and swing the phone clamp end downward like a hammer head.

data.proxyObjectName: small silver cylindrical container or weight
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the cylinder from the top like a small handle, let its mass hang below the fist, and guide sweeping cuts with forearm rotation
